participant_1.background:
I want to learn how to do stunts on my motorcycle.
my last name is spanish , but i tell people that it s italian.
I drink a lot of juice and yogurt to make up for my lack of vegetables.
I grew up in a small town in the Midwest, but I've always dreamed of living in the desert.
I used to run long distances, but my feet can't take it anymore.

i have 3 sisters and 2 brothers.
i cannot get enough ginger snaps.
i have been bankrupt and back.
I enjoy a glass of red wine with my dinner, but since breaking my leg, I have been sticking to water.

content.text: Pretty good, thanks for asking. What about you?
I'm doing well, thanks. So, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to spend time with my friends and family, and I also enjoy reading and writing.
That sounds nice. I like to do a lot of the same things. I also like to go on bike rides and hike.
I love to go on bike rides! I haven't been hiking in a while, but I used to really enjoy it.
It's a lot of fun, especially when you're with friends. So, what do you do for work?
I'm a teacher. I love my job, but it can be really challenging sometimes.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to be a teacher, but I don't think I have the patience for it.
It definitely takes a lot of patience, but it's also really rewarding.
I'm sure it is. So, what's your favorite thing about being a teacher?
My favorite thing is seeing the light bulb go off in my students' eyes when they understand something. That's why I love teaching.
That's a great answer. I'm sure it's really rewarding to see that.
It is. So, what do you do for work?
